import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Register.css"; import axios from "axios"; function Register({ icon }) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [data, setData] = useState(""); const sendUserData = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data = { name: name, email: email, password: password, }; axios .post("http://localhost:8080/api/user", data) .then((res) => { setData(res.data); setEmail(""); setName(""); setPassword(""); }) .catch((err) => { console.log("error..."); }); }; return (

setName(e.target.value)} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

); } export default Register;
